keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats are the only party committed to keeping Britain in the single market and will fight any Brexit deal that threatens jobs and prosperity.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Real investment to save our NHS
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Lib Dems are the only party with a fully-funded spending plan to save our health services - Tim Farron's penny on Income Tax.
Lib Dems introduced the triple-lock and will fight any Conservative attempts to scrap it.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Bookies and pundits agree Conservatives out of the race. Ashcroft declares Cambridge seat 'too close to call'.

issues.brexitEurope: Stop Brexit wrecking the country. Only the Lib Dems committed to keeping Britain in the single market.
issues.health: Lib Dems are the only party with a fully-funded spending plan to save our health services.
issues.transport: Tackle Cambridge's congestion and pollution. Build an integrated transport network.

community.content: Build more affordable homes for local people

politicalExperience.achievements: Reputation for securing improvements for Cambridge.

endorsements.endorsement: Declares Cambridge seat 'too close to call'.

quotes.text: Only the Lib Dems can stop hard Brexit
Lib Dems pledge to invest extra £6 billion in NHS and social care
Lib Dems promise to protect state pension with triple lock

examples: Only the Lib Dems can stop hard Brexit
Lib Dems pledge to invest extra £6 billion in NHS and social care
Lib Dems promise to protect state pension with triple lock
Julian Huppert, The best person for the job...
Respect and diversity in our community
Build more affordable homes for local people
He'll carry on where he left off and work to deliver even more for local families.
Real investment to save our NHS

personalStories.story: Julian exerted praise for putting the needs of ordinary people above party politics. He played a major role in securing widespread grassroots funding for NHS and social care.

examples: Lord Ashcroft: Declares Cambridge seat 'too close to call'.
It's Julian or Corbyn's Labour here.

nonPolicyAttributes.localness: Julian built a reputation for securing improvements for Cambridge.

examples: Julian built a reputation for securing improvements for Cambridge.
